name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】『EVERMORE』 Ninomae Ina'nis Birthday Live 2025  #EvermoreLIVE [I-J11Da5ONY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Ninomae Ina'nis finishes singing a song.
Ina thanks the viewers and prepares for a merch announcement.
Merch announcement section for Ina's 2025 birthday.
Ina says goodbye and signs off.
End credits roll over instrumental music.
